name: A King Beyond the Wall
lowestOnDefeat: Moves his tokens to the lowest position of every Influence track.
othersOnDefeat: In turn order, each player chooses either the Fiefdoms or King's Court Influence track and moves his token to the lowest position of that track.
highestOnVictory: Moves his token to the top of one Influence track of his choice, then takes the appropriate Dominance token.

name: Crow Killers
lowestOnDefeat: Replaces all of his Knights with available Footmen. Any Knight unable to be replaced is destroyed.
othersOnDefeat: Replaces 2 of their Knights with available Footmen. Any Knight unable to be replaced is destroyed.
highestOnVictory: May immediately replace up to 2 of his Footmen, anywhere, with available Knights.

name: Mammoth Riders
highestOnVictory: May retrieve 1 House card of his choice from his House card discard pile.

name: Massing on the Milkwater
lowestOnDefeat: If he has more than one House card in his hand, he discards all cards with the highest combat strength.
othersOnDefeat: If they have more than one House card in their hand, they must choose and discard one of those cards.
highestOnVictory: Returns his entire House card discard pile into his hand.

name: Preemptive Raid
lowestOnDefeat: Choose one of the following: A. Destroys 2 of his units anywhere. B. Is reduced 2 positions on his highest Influence track.
highestOnVictory: The wildlings immediately attack again with a strength of 6. You do not participate in the bidding against this attack. (nor do you receive any rewards or penalties)

name: Rattleshirt's Raiders
lowestOnDefeat: Is reduced 2 positions on the Supply track (to no lower than 0).
othersOnDefeat: Is reduced 1 position on the Supply track (to no lower than 0). Then reconcile armies to their new supply limits.
highestOnVictory: Is increased 1 position on the Supply track (to no higher than 6).

name: Skinchanger Scout
othersOnDefeat: Discards 2 available Power tokens, or as many as they are able.
highestOnVictory: All Power tokens he bid on this attack are immediately returned to his available Power.

name: The Horde Descends
lowestOnDefeat: Destroys 2 of his units at one of his Castles or Strongholds. If unable, he destroys 2 of his units anywhere.
highestOnVictory: May muster forces (following normal mustering rules) in any one Castle or Stronghold area he controls.
